content:
and i made kal upset, oh welp minor disagreement over camping in baro made him so mad that he kicked me and david, sorry not sorry, and now we yapping in vc bout to most random topics, likee datacenters, houses, land, servers, hostings, and laughing at portugal, 
we are waiting for anvil playtest to start but im not really into the mood for it since there's no alex with us... maybe i'll go for a walk or something like that
